pr_title: merge of actual master to jakartified jersey

timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: Oddly enough, this line did not make it to this merge request
timeline.author: jansupol

replies.bodyText: missing module is added to Jetty11 profile, because otherwise this module does not work in JDK 1.8 (due to jakartified Jetty), so it shall be moved to profile with other tests which uses jetty (with JDK 11+)
replies.author: senivam
